sidebar.selectModelHint: Select a model from the main panel to edit

droid.helpers.title: Helpers
droid.helpers.envConflict.title: Environment Variable Conflict
droid.helpers.envConflict.description: If you're using Claude Code and encounter 401 errors with custom models, it may be caused by the ANTHROPIC_AUTH_TOKEN environment variable conflicting with your custom model's API key.
droid.helpers.envConflict.solution: Solution: Delete or comment out the ANTHROPIC_AUTH_TOKEN environment variable in your shell config file (e.g., ~/.zshrc, ~/.bashrc, or PowerShell profile), then restart your terminal or system.
droid.helpers.skipLogin.title: Try Skip Login
droid.helpers.skipLogin.description: This will add FACTORY_API_KEY to your shell config file to skip Factory login verification.
droid.helpers.skipLogin.warning: This may not work in all cases. You need to restart your terminal and the app for changes to take effect.
droid.helpers.skipLogin.success: Added to {{file}}. Please restart your terminal and the app.
droid.helpers.skipLogin.manualSetupWindo: Could not auto-configure. Please add the following line to your PowerShell profile ($PROFILE) manually:
droid.helpers.skipLogin.manualSetupUnix: Could not detect your shell. Please add the following line to your shell config file (e.g., ~/.zshrc or ~/.bashrc) manually:
droid.helpers.skipLogin.toolLimitationHi: After bypassing login with a Key, some tools (e.g., WebSearch) may not be available. It's recommended to log in with an actual account for full functionality. Use /status in Droid to check current authentication status.
droid.helpers.cloudSessionSync.title: Cloud Session Sync
droid.helpers.cloudSessionSync.descripti: When enabled, sessions will be automatically synced to the cloud
droid.helpers.sessionSettings.title: Session Settings
droid.helpers.sessionSettings.reasoningE: Controls how much structured thinking the model performs
Only applies to official Droid models, not BYOK custom models
droid.helpers.sessionSettings.diffModeDe: Choose how droid displays code changes
droid.helpers.sessionSettings.todoDispla: How the todo list is displayed in the UI
droid.helpers.sessionSettings.includeCoA: Automatically append the Droid co-author trailer to git commits
droid.helpers.sessionSettings.showThinki: Display AI thinking/reasoning blocks in the main chat view

channels.title: Channels
channels.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete "{{name}}"? This will also remove the system token from your keychain. This action cannot be undone.
channels.privacyNotice: Your username, password, and other private data are stored locally on your device only and are never uploaded to any server.
channels.selectChannelHint: Select a channel from the sidebar or add a new one
keys.title: API Keys
keys.noKeysHint: Click Refresh to fetch keys from the channel.
models.title: BYOK Model Configuration
models.defaultHint: New Droid windows will use this model, use /model to switch temporarily
models.setAsDefaultHint: New Droid windows will automatically use this model
models.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this model? This action cannot be undone.
models.noModelsAvailable: No models available for this key.
models.fetchModelsError: Please enter API URL and API Key first
models.configParseError.title: Config File Error
models.configParseError.description: The settings.json file is corrupted or invalid. Would you like to reset it and save your current models? This will remove any other settings in the file.
models.refreshConfirm.title: Discard Changes?
models.refreshConfirm.description: You have unsaved changes. Refreshing will discard all changes and reload from the config file.
models.batchDeleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete {{count}} models? This action cannot be undone.
models.noMatchingModels: No models match the filter criteria
models.import.title: Import Models
models.import.description: Select models to import and choose how to handle duplicates.
models.import.invalidFormat: Invalid file format. Expected a valid export file.
models.import.noValidModels: No valid models found in the file.
